column4: guys i got a little problem here, when i try to install wine, it finds GCC 3.4, but it gives the error: Checking for C compiler default output file name... configure: error: C compiler cannot create executables, what to do?
anybody knows how to fix the error i get when i try to install wine? error is: Checking for C compiler default output file name... configure: error: C compiler cannot create executables
